item.title: Configuring mypy
item.description: Mypy does not have strict settings by default. It has to have a config, to do a proper type checking: Good: Professional-grade mypy configuration - Wolt How to start type-checking a large Python codebase Other: mypy: how to use it in my project? Europython 2018: Getting Started with Mypy and Type Checking
